mixins.description:
A set of common functions to be shared between versions of ARC
on different platforms.

This mixin contains methods platform independent. Platform dependent functions
should be implemented in the version of the app.

## DOM requirements

The mixin requires the element to have `arc-request-workspace` (or similar)
to be placerd in the DOM with id set to "workspace".

properties.name: componentsDir
properties.description:
A base path to the web componentes. It is used to determine
components location when including parts of the application.

properties.name: routeParams
properties.description: Additional route params read from navigation

properties.name: _loadingSources
properties.description: When true then a source components are being loaded.

properties.name: page
properties.description: Currently opened application screen

properties.name: gaCustomDimensions
properties.description: Google Analytics custom dimmensions

properties.name: gaCustomMetrics
properties.description: Google Analytics custom metrics

properties.name: appId
properties.description: Application ID for analytics

properties.name: appVersion
properties.description: Current application varsion

properties.name: browserVersion
properties.description: Browser version

properties.name: appChannel
properties.description: Application channel, `stable`, `beta`, `dev`

properties.name: newMessages
properties.description: List of unread messages from app developer.

properties.name: appMessages
properties.description: List of cached messages from app developer.

properties.name: messageCenterOpened
properties.description: If true, messages center is opened.

properties.name: hasAppUpdate
properties.description:
True if application update is possible.
In web version it means rthe service worker updated files.

properties.name: _scrollTarget
properties.description: A scroll target for the components that relays on this property.

properties.name: telemetry
properties.description: When set it enables Google Analytics

properties.name: driveAccessToken
properties.description: Google Drive access token

properties.name: log
properties.description: A logger

properties.name: config
properties.description:
Application user configuration read from the config file.
It may not be ready when the app is initialized.

properties.name: historyEnabled
properties.description:
True if history should be enabled. This value is set from settings
object.

properties.name: menuConfig
properties.description:
Configuration object related to ARC menu.
It is used with menu popups. When a menu panel is pop out to new
window then selected menu is not rendered.

This mixin does not provide methods to listen for changes in this
object as implementation is different dependening on the platform.

Available keys:
- menuDisabled - true when menu should not be visible in the UI
- hideHistory
- hideSaved
- hideProjects
- hideApis

methods.name: _loadComponent
methods.description:
Lazy loads component to the DOM.
It builds the component path as a `componentsDir` + bower_components
+ `path` + .html.

**Example**

```javascript
this._loadComponent('api-console/api-console')
.then(() => {}); // console is now loaded.
```

methods.name: _loadWorkspace
methods.description:
This component ensures that the workspace is loaded into the DOM.
It can be used when curreent operation don't require workspace to be
present in the DOM before bit it will now.

methods.name: _handleNavigation
methods.description: Handles navigation event and sets the route data.

methods.name: _telemetryScreen
methods.description: Sends screen view to Google Analytics

return.desc: A promise resolved to a settings object.

methods.name: _analyticsEnabled
methods.description:
Enables Google Analytics.

Until settings status is checked Google Analytics components is not
even in the DOM. Once the `telemetry` flag is set analytics elements
are attached to the DOM and start handling events.

This can be disabled by calling `_analyticsDisabled` or by sending
`settings-changed` custom event with `telemetry` key.

methods.name: _analyticsDisabled
methods.description: To be called if GA is disabled to remove GA elements from the DOM.

methods.name: _telemetryChanged
methods.description: A function that handles `telemetry` property chnage.

params.name: opts
params.description:
Optional options object. It can contain `source`
property with value of `shortcut` to indicate that the shortcut was
used and the app can automatically save current request

methods.name: closeOtherWorkspaceTabs
methods.description: Closes all workspace tabs but selected.

params.name: index
params.description: Index of a tab to leave in workspace.

methods.name: duplicateWorkspaceTab
methods.description: Duplicates tab values at a position

methods.name: getTabsCount
methods.description: Returns number of currently opened tabs

return.desc: Number of opened tabs in request workspace.

methods.name: newRequestTab
methods.description: Opens new tab in the request workspace.

methods.name: updateRequestTab
methods.description: Updates a request object in this window for a specific tab.

params.name: index
params.description:
Tab index to update. If not provided (or not a number)
it uses current active tab.

params.name: detail
params.description:
The detail object to set on the event.
Each navigate event requires `base` property to be set.

methods.name: openDrivePicker
methods.description: Navigates to Google Drive file browser

methods.name: _appVersionRequestHandler
methods.description: Handles ARC components event for application version.

methods.name: _googleOauthTokenRequested
methods.description:
Handler for `google-autorize` custom event sent by Drive component.
It calls `_requestAuthToken()` function which should be implemented
for a specific platform.

methods.name: notifyError
methods.description:
Abstract method to be implemented by ARC instances to notify user about
an error.

methods.name: _ispectImportHandler
methods.description: Handler for `import-data-inspect`. Opens import panel and adds data to it.

return.desc: A promise resolved when the component is loaded. It for tests.

mixins.name: ArcComponents.ArcAppMixin
